profession_text: I'm a passionate software developer from Colombia, constantly searching for innovative solutions. I enjoy creating and perfecting applications that make a difference.
about_me:
I am a software developer with over {{years}} years of experience, specializing in Flutter and mobile development. I have also worked with React and TypeScript in front-end web development. I thrive on tackling complex challenges and enjoy finding efficient solutions to seemingly impossible problems.I like to express my ideas and perspectives, and I strongly believe in continuous learning. When I encounter obstacles, I take a step back, breathe, and return with a clearer and stronger mindset. I am always open to feedback and constructive criticism, as I see them as valuable opportunities for personal and professional growth.
Stepping away from the professional side, in case you're interested: outside of coding, I enjoy playing video games, exploring new things, and reading theories about life and the universe.
